title.rendered: Albert Pinto Ko Gussa Kyun Aata Hai?

content.rendered:
Directed by Soumitra Ranade.

Written by Soumitra Ranade.

Cast Nandita Das(Stella) . Amarjeet Amle(Satam). Sushma Bakshi(Albert’s Mother). Padmanabh Bind(Stella’s Brother). Yusuf Hussain(Jeff Pinto – Albert’s Father). Ravi Jhankal(Stella’s Father). Rama Joshi(Old Lady with Luggage). Kishore Kadam(Pramod Naik – Police Inspector).Atul Kale. Amrish Majumdar(Book Shop Manager). Onkar Das Manikpuri(Village man (as Omkar Das Manikpuri)). Gaurav Nima(Chhotu). Parivesh Padhy(Dominic Pinto). Sunit Razdan(Suryakant). Saurabh Shukla(Nayar). Jayshankar Tripathi(Japtap) .

Language Hindi.

Producers Sameer Bhole. Parivesh Padhy. Gurudas Pai. Pinke Ankur Patel. Noopur Raje. Soumitra Ranade. Vikram Saxena. Abhayanand Singh. Piiyush Singh.

Production Golden Ratio Films. Paperboat Design Studios.
